solution_line_template: It will take {pool_capacity} / {bucket_capacity} = <<{pool_capacity}/{bucket_capacity}={number_of_trips}>>{number_of_trips} trips to fill the pool with water.
This will take Jimmy {number_of_trips} trips * {time_per_trip_seconds} seconds per trip = <<{number_of_trips}*{time_per_trip_seconds}={total_time_seconds}>>{total_time_seconds} seconds.
This means that Jimmy will spend {total_time_seconds} seconds * {minutes_per_second_fraction} = {total_time_minutes} minutes filling the pool.
